interpretation:
The cherry blossom card represents new beginnings, growth, and renewal. Just as the cherry blossom blooms in the spring, this card suggests that you may be on the cusp of a new phase in your life. This could be a new relationship, a new job, or a new project. Embrace the change and trust that it will bring positive results. 

However, it is important to remember that the cherry blossom's beauty is fleeting. Enjoy the present moment and appreciate the small joys in life. Don't get too caught up in the future and forget to live in the present. 

Associated Keywords: growth, renewal, new beginnings, beauty, impermanence, appreciation, mindfulness.
